mapper.sql: ID, MERCHANT_NO, MERCHANT_NAME, NEED_PAY_INTEGRATION, NOT_NEED_PAY_INTEGRATION, INTEGRATION_COUPON, NEED_PAY_TOTAL_INTEGRATION, TOTAL_INTEGRATION, PAYMENT_TIME, CREATE_TIME
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from TRADE_INTEGRATION_REPORT
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
insert into TRADE_INTEGRATION_REPORT
ID,
MERCHANT_NO,
MERCHANT_NAME,
NEED_PAY_INTEGRATION,
NOT_NEED_PAY_INTEGRATION,
INTEGRATION_COUPON,
NEED_PAY_TOTAL_INTEGRATION,
TOTAL_INTEGRATION,
PAYMENT_TIME,
CREATE_TIME,
#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{merchantNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{merchantName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{needPayIntegration,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{notNeedPayIntegration,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{integrationCoupon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{needPayTotalIntegration,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{totalIntegration,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{paymentTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update TRADE_INTEGRATION_REPORT
ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MERCHANT_NO = #{record.merchantNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MERCHANT_NAME = #{record.merchantName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NEED_PAY_INTEGRATION = #{record.needPayIntegration,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NOT_NEED_PAY_INTEGRATION = #{record.notNeedPayIntegration,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INTEGRATION_COUPON = #{record.integrationCoupon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NEED_PAY_TOTAL_INTEGRATION = #{record.needPayTotalIntegration,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TOTAL_INTEGRATION = #{record.totalIntegration,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAYMENT_TIME = #{record.paymentTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update TRADE_INTEGRATION_REPORT set ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MERCHANT_NO = #{record.merchantNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MERCHANT_NAME = #{record.merchantName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NEED_PAY_INTEGRATION = #{record.needPayIntegration,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOT_NEED_PAY_INTEGRATION = #{record.notNeedPayIntegration,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INTEGRATION_COUPON = #{record.integrationCoupon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NEED_PAY_TOTAL_INTEGRATION = #{record.needPayTotalIntegration,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TOTAL_INTEGRATION = #{record.totalIntegration,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAYMENT_TIME = #{record.paymentTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

update TRADE_INTEGRATION_REPORT
MERCHANT_NO = #{merchantNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MERCHANT_NAME = #{merchantName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NEED_PAY_INTEGRATION = #{needPayIntegration,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NOT_NEED_PAY_INTEGRATION = #{notNeedPayIntegration,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INTEGRATION_COUPON = #{integrationCoupon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NEED_PAY_TOTAL_INTEGRATION = #{needPayTotalIntegration,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TOTAL_INTEGRATION = #{totalIntegration,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAYMENT_TIME = #{paymentTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update TRADE_INTEGRATION_REPORT set MERCHANT_NO = #{merchantNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MERCHANT_NAME = #{merchantName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NEED_PAY_INTEGRATION = #{needPayIntegration,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOT_NEED_PAY_INTEGRATION = #{notNeedPayIntegration,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INTEGRATION_COUPON = #{integrationCoupon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NEED_PAY_TOTAL_INTEGRATION = #{needPayTotalIntegration,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TOTAL_INTEGRATION = #{totalIntegration,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAYMENT_TIME = #{paymentTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select:
select * from TRADE_INTEGRATION_REPORT where PAYMENT_TIME >= to_char(#{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'yyyy-MM-dd') and PAYMENT_TIME <= to_char(#{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'yyyy-MM-dd')
and MERCHANT_NO = #{merchantNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.delete: delete from TRADE_INTEGRATION_REPORT where trunc(CREATE_TIME) = trunc(#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
